short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browse Beyond! Navigate and organize your websites with boxes instead of tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Never feel overwhelmed by too many tabs!  Boxy is a way to navigate and organize your websites that uses boxes, which you move freely in 2 dimensions, instead of tabs. Move those boxes around where you want, write text, draw lines, save your layouts and much more. You can now surf the internet without limits with our revolutionary patented design! 

Features:
- Add a background to the canvas or dashboard by uploading images.
- What you can do with boxes:  activate and deactivate, hide and unhide,  move in any direction, close and open sites, create non-tab boxes.
